person.persName: David Martin (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and pvt 9th KY Cav CSA)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Polly Ragland Martin in Bath County in December 1829. Married to Jane Thompson Estill Martin in Bath County in March 1851. Father of John D. Martin. Married to Margaret Martin. Father of William S. Martin. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Employed Samuel Estill as a farmhand in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in 1860. Household owned one additional slave in 1860. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from September 15, 1862. Reported as missing from Woodbury, Tennessee, May 1, 1863.
